data.title: Växjö climate: Weather Växjö & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Växjö

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Växjö

>>average temperature by month Växjö

>>Weather Växjö

The climatic conditions in Växjö are characterized by a warm and temperate atmosphere. The city of Växjö experiences a significant amount of rainfall, even during the month with historically low precipitation levels. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The average annual temperature is 7.3 °C | 45.2 °F in Växjö. The annual rainfall is 774 mm | 30.5 inch.

Växjö is in the northern hemisphere. -> It is situated in the upper half of the planet. Summer begins in September and ends at the end of June. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Växjö

The month characterized by the lowest precipitation levels is March, exhibiting a mere 44 mm | 1.7 inch of rainfall. The majority of rainfall occurs during the month with the highest precipitation, which is July, and has an average amount of 93 mm | 3.7 inch.

average temperature by month Växjö

On average, the month of July experiences the highest temperature with an average value of 17.2 °C | 62.9 °F. During the month of January, the mean temperature registers at a minimum value of -1.5 °C | 29.2 °F. This represents the coldest monthly average throughout the entire year.

Växjö weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Växjö

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Växjö, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is June with an average of 10.09 hours of sunshine. In total there are 302.79 hours of sunshine throughout June.

The month exhibiting the least number of daily sunshine hours in Växjö is January, presenting an average of only 1.44 hours per day. The total accumulation of sunlight during this period amounts to approximately 44.68.

Around 2006.54 hours of sunshine are counted in Växjö throughout the year. On average there are 65.8 hours of sunshine per month.

Airport close to Växjö

The closest Airports of Växjö are: Växjö/Kronoberg Airport (VXO) 6.98km,Ronneby Airport (RNB) 74.33km,Kalmar Airport (KLR) 92.55km

You can reach Växjö from this Cities by Plane: Oslo (OSL), Alicante (ALC), Stockholm (BMA), Amsterdam (AMS), Halmstad (HAD)
